DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this ex-vivo study is to estimate the optimal platelet quantity necessary to reverse the antiplatelet effects of prasugrel.
DOC.brief_title: Ex-Vivo Reversion of Platelet Inhibition Induced by Prasugrel
DOC.criteria: Acute coronary syndrome Prasugrel loading dose 624h before inclusion Clopidogrel loading dose GPIIbIIIa use within 10 days before inclusion Known congenital thrombopathy and/or congenital coagulation defect
